question: Which company opens Research and Development centre in China?
option3: The Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion (DIPP)
explanation: BMW motors have opened a new research and development (R&D) centre in China, the largest outside of Germany. The centre will focus on new energy technology to establish a complete R&D and production chain in China. China has become the largest single market for BMW automotive vehicles. Earlier in May, the BMW assembly plant in Shenyang's Dadong district began operations.ss
